Content_wSideColumn.BodyCopy:
Get Ready for Adventure!

AFY Life After High School is the sequel to other youth programs.  If you have already done AFY, this is the program for you! This experience is designed to help older teens better prepare for critical life decisions.  Participants will engage in various activities emphasizing college and life preparation.  This program is centered around Franklin Covey's "7 Habits of Highly Effective College Students," nightly fireside devotionals, and a special workshop with college prep expert Henry J. Eyring.  They will also participate in whitewater rafting, high ropes courses, and leadership-building activites.  By inspiring greatness and self-confidence, Leadership for Life gives youth the tools, vision, and passion to become the disciple leaders of tomorrow!

What to Look Forward to:

  • Engaging workshops designed to build self-confidence and leadership skills
  • Special workshop with Henry J. Eyring
  • "7 Habits of Highly Effective College Students" workshops
  • Whitewater rafting
  • High ropes courses and initiatives (Principle-based experiential learning)
  • Participants stay in bunk cabins

Remember each program is centered around the Gospel of Jesus Christ and includes nightly firesides, student led devotionals, and large and small group games that teach principles of the gospel with lasting effect.  Plus what is a youth program without a dance!  Prepare to make friends and memories that will help shape the rest of your life!

How You Will Be Staying:

  • Stays in bunk cabins that can sleep up to 8. (Roommate request is available.)
  • Each group will split into relatively small numbers and matched with a certified program counselor that will be with them every step of the way.
  • Excellent meals will be provided.
  • You will be outdoors everyday, so plan accordingly.  We have facilities and covered areas in case of bad weather, but don't forget to bring sunblock and bug spray!  Here is a list to the packing list we recommend.

Register Now!
The Cost of AFY Life After High School is $425.
This includes all meals, lodging, and activities.
